mapper.select: SELECT bulletin_no, cover_photo, title, writer, matching_state, start_time, end_time, writing_time, animal_count, walk_place_address, matching_kind, client_code, puppy_code FROM matching_board ORDER BY bulletin_no

SELECT bulletin_no, cover_photo, title, writer, matching_state, start_time, end_time, writing_time, animal_count, walk_place_address, matching_kind, client_code, puppy_code FROM matching_board WHERE bulletin_no = #{bulletinNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matching_board( bulletin_no, cover_photo, title, writer, matching_state, start_time, end_time, writing_time, animal_count, walk_place_address, matching_kind, client_code, puppy_code) VALUES (#{bulletinNo}, #{coverPhoto}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{matchingState}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{writingTime}, #{animalCount}, #{walkPlaceAddress}, #{matchingKind}, #{clientCode}, #{puppyCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE matching_board SET cover_photo = #{coverPhoto}, title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, matching_state = #{matchingState}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, writing_time = #{writingTime}, animal_count = #{animalCount}, walk_place_address = #{walkPlaceAddress}, matching_kind = #{matchingKind}, client_code = #{clientCode}, puppy_code = #{puppyCode}, WHERE bulletin_no = #{bulletinNo}
